title: Standardizing Rigs in Maya - DigitalTutors 720p MP4
description:
Standardizing Rigs in Maya - DigitalTutors 720p MP4

In this Maya tutorial, we learn the why's and how's of standardizing control rigs within Maya. 

We'll start by first understanding why it's important to standardize rigs, looking at a few different scenarios that involve rigging and animation. We'll then learn how to approach organizing our scenes in a very artist-friendly way.
